KemenPAN-RB Cek 'Dilan' di Pengadilan Tinggi Jateng, Ini Hasilnya
01 Nov 2019, 07:39 by Angling Adhitya Purbaya


Kemenpan RB cek 'Dilan' di PT Jateng.Foto: Angling Adhitya Purbaya/detikcom

Semarang - Evaluator Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (KemenPAN RB) melakukan sidak di Pengadilan Tinggi (PT) Jawa Tengah untuk melakukan penilaian. Beberapa evaluasi dicatat agar PT bisa menjadi role model zona integritas anti korupsi serta memenuhi konsep Dilan atau Digital Melayani.Evaluator Kemenpan RB, Arif Tri Haryanto dan satu rekannya datang ke PT Jateng di Jalan Pahlawan Semarang. Kebetulan hari ini sedang ada pelantikan beberapa ketua Pengadilan Negeri di Jawa Tengah.Arif melihat berbagai aspek pelayanan di kantor tersebut. Salah satu yang diminta diperbaiki yaitu papan Maklumat Pelayanan yang berisi janji pegawai pengadilan untuk taat aturan. Papan itu berada di lorong sebelah kanan lobi, dan Arif meminta agar dipindah ke lobi agar pengunjung bisa langsung membacanya."Ya yang pertama bagaimana menempatkan maklumat pelayanan," kata Arif, Jumat (1/11/2019).Berikutnya yaitu terkait area steril untuk hakim. Arif saat kunjungannya itu merasa area steril masih kurang. Namun Kepala PT Jateng, Sri Sutatiek mengatakan area steril sengaja dibuka karena sedang ada acara yaitu Pelantikan Ketua PN."Hakim independensinya harus dijaga harus ada steril area. Akan kami ingatkan lagi. Setiap orang tidak boleh masuk area hakim kerja. Dulunya itu tempat rawan," ujar Arif."Itu tadi ada pelantikan kita buka sementara, nanti tutup lagi," imbuh Sri Sutatiek.Arif menjelaskan, evaluasi dilakukan pada unit kerja yang diajukan oleh Mahkamah Agung untuk mendapatkan predikat bebas korupsi. Selain itu juga untuk dievaluasi kualitas pelayanan serta komitmen pegawainya."Dari Kemenpan RB ingin lihat pembangunan zona integritas. PT Jawa Tengah ini unit kerja yang diajukan MA untuk dinilai," jelasnya.Ia menambahkan, Kemenpan RB juga ingin mendorong agar pemerintahan sesuai visi misi Presiden-Wakil Presiden yaitu Dilan atau Digital Melayani. Di PT Jateng ia menjelaskan sudah mulai ada pelayanan online yaitu Sistem Informasi Layanan Perkara atau Silaper."Intinya pealayanan seprti visi misi Presiden seperti saat debat pak Wapres pemerintah ke depan yang Dilan,, digital melayani. Sudah muncul di PT Jateng, intinya dalam peningkatan pelayanan dan jaga integritas tidak hanya PT atau PN," tutur Arif.Namun ternyata Silaper saat ini masih memiliki kekurangan yaitu kapasitas server yang belum memadai. Maka pihak PT Jateng sedang mengajukan permohonan ke MA untuk pembaruan server."Kalau mau digital melayani, maka harus ada server mumpuni sebagai back bone," tegasnya.Ia menuturkan hal-hal yang dievaluasi selama beberapa jam tadi ada 6 aspek yaitu manajemen perubahan,tata laksana seperti SOP-nya seperti apa, sumber daya manusia, akuntabilitas kinerja, pengawasan integritas, dan kualitas pelayanan publik."Karena sifatnya membangun, kalau ada yang masih kurang kita ingatkan. Lebih ke membangun, tidak hanya kalau tidak ada terus dicoret," katanya.

KemenPAN-RB Checks 'Dilan' in Central Java High Court, Here's the Result
Nov 01 2019, 07:39 by Angling Adhitya Purbaya


Kemenpan RB checks 'Dilan' at PT Jateng. Photo: Angling Adhitya Purbaya / detikcom

Semarang - Evaluator of the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN RB) conducted a sudden inspection at the Central Java High Court to conduct an assessment. Several evaluations were noted so that PT could become a role model for anti-corruption integrity zones and meet the Dilan or Digital Serving concept. The Ministry of RB's evaluator, Arif Tri Haryanto and one of his colleagues came to PT Jateng on Jalan Pahlawan Semarang. It so happened that today there was an inauguration of several heads of the District Courts in Central Java. Ari saw various aspects of service in the office. One of the things that was asked to be improved was the Service Information Board that contained court employee promises to obey the rules. The sign is located in the hallway to the right of the lobby, and Arif asked to be moved to the lobby so that visitors can immediately read it. "Yes, the first is how to place a service notice," Arif said, Friday (11/01/2019). The next is related to a sterile area for judge. Arif during his visit felt that the sterile area was still lacking. But the Head of PT Jateng, Sri Sutatiek, said that the sterile area was deliberately opened because there was an event, namely the Inauguration of the Chief of the PN. "The independence judge must be guarded, there must be a sterile area. "Arif said." That was the opening we had temporarily opened, then closed again, "added Sri Sutatiek. Ari explained, the evaluation was carried out on a work unit proposed by the Supreme Court to get the title free of corruption. In addition to evaluating the quality of service and commitment of employees. "From Kemenpan RB wants to see the development of the integrity zone. PT Central Java is the work unit proposed by the Supreme Court to be assessed," he explained. He added, Kemenpan RB also wanted to encourage the government in accordance with the vision and mission of the President - Vice President namely Dilan or Digital Serving. At PT Jateng, he explained that an online service has started, namely the Case Information Service System or Silaper. "The point is that services such as the vision and mission of the President, such as during the debate the next Vice President of the government that Dilan, digital serves. Already appeared at PT Central Java, essentially in improving services and keep the integrity of not only PT or PN, "said Arif. But it turns out that Silaper currently still has shortcomings namely inadequate server capacity. So PT Central Java is submitting an application to the Supreme Court for server updates. "If you want digital service, then there must be a qualified server as a back bone," he said. He said things that were evaluated over the past few hours had 6 aspects namely change management, governance What kind of SOP is it like, human resources, performance accountability, integrity supervision, and the quality of public services. "Because it is constructive, if there is something that is still lacking, we remind. It is more to build, not only if nothing continues to be crossed out," he said. .
